    • Method Detail

      • interruptableWriteStreamToFile

        public static void interruptableWriteStreamToFile(java.io.InputStream is,
                                                  java.io.File file)
                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        Copy data from an input stream to a file, while checking for thread interrupts. Note the IO calls are not interruptable, so this only does best effort. Other techniques should be used in addition, such as separately closing a underlying connection, to help ensure a prompt return if needed.
        Parameters:
        is - source input stream
        file - destination file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • syncedFileForcedRename

        public static void syncedFileForcedRename(java.io.File from,
                                          java.io.File to)
        Synchronized rename of a file, which overwrites any previous content. Routine to guarantee only one thread at a time attempts to rename a file, potentially overwriting an existing file. Use when two or more threads might collide in moving files, the order of renames/overwrites is unimportant.
        Parameters:
        from - source file (must exist)
        to - destination file (may exist)

      • bytesToHexString

        public static java.lang.String bytesToHexString(byte[] data)
        Converts binary data to a hex digit representation.
        Parameters:
        data - binary hash data to convert to a hex string.
        Returns:
        a string of hex nibbles encoding the input data.

      • sha1AsHexString

        public static java.lang.String sha1AsHexString(java.lang.String string)
        Creates a SHA-1 hash of an input string, encoded as a hex nibble string.
        Parameters:
        string - a UTF8-encoded string to hash.
        Returns:
        a hex-encoded SHA-1 hash of string.

      • createHttpConnection

        public static java.net.HttpURLConnection createHttpConnection(java.lang.String url)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new HTTP connection object and attempts to connect. Sets caching, redirection, user interaction, and do output options to false.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of page to download.
        Returns:
        a new HTTP connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to create a new HTTP connection.

      • pause

        public static void pause(long seconds)
        Pause (sleep) for a fixed time, exit if interrupted. This is a convenience routine meant for use in situations where an interruption indicates abnormal behavior.
        Parameters:
        seconds - is the length of time to pause.
